question: 宿題
sourceMnemonic: The <kanji>lodge</kanji> you're staying in has a <kanji>topic</kanji> around it. Think of it as a theme. This theme is doing your <vocabulary>homework</vocabulary>. So yeah, you just went to a nice lodge for vacation only to have to do homework everywhere.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
